content: We may have the greater likelihood of survival if we let AI take over — not like making humanity extinct but solving all our mega problems. We are restricted due to our slow biological composition and in the next two decades, human way of dealing with things will be highly unproductive and thus worthless. Benefits of AI are excessively powerful if you measure up with negatives. Seems not so bad that we will be stepping away from the idea of being “productive” and “efficient’, and maybe we will find “happiness” this way. We might get enough time and motivation to cultivate our approach towards life
